messages.title: Making Brexit a Success Is Central to Our National Interest
messages.content: As a nation, we face the most important period in our lifetime. Making Brexit a success is central to our national interest – and it is central to your own security and prosperity.

messages.title: That’s Why I Decided We Need an Election Now
messages.content: By going to Brussels with a strong negotiating hand I can ensure we guarantee our economic security. That means delivering better paying jobs, more affordable housing, a good school place for every child, and a strong economy paying for a strong NHS.

messages.title: The Choice is Clear
messages.content: Strong and stable leadership with me in the national interest, to see us through Brexit and beyond. Or a hung parliament and coalition of chaos with Jeremy Corbyn.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ensure economic security and strong negotiating hand in Brexit.
Guarantee a good school place for every child.
Strong economy paying for a strong NHS.

mentions.tacticalSituation: There are only two people who can possibly be Prime Minister after the election to negotiate Brexit – me or Jeremy Corbyn.
